definitions.definition: Synonym of plunder , to seize by violence particularly during the capture of a city during war or ( video games ) after successful combat .
examples: We looted the temple and the orphanage, which turned most of the NPCs against us.

definitions.definition: Synonym of rob , to steal something from someone by violence or threat of violence .

main_definition: ( transitive ) Synonym of plunder , to seize by violence particularly during the capture of a city during war or ( video games ) after successful combat .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , chiefly South Asian ) Synonym of rob , to steal something from someone by violence or threat of violence .
